He was stabbed after intervening in a dispute between a taxi driver and a pair of men in downtown Vancouver. Kenneth Bryson Williams was charged with one count of second degree murder. He was convicted and sentenced to life in prison with no parole eligibility for 10 years

Name: Marvin Benitez - Feb. 6, 2014
Description: A passer-by found the 21-year-old Burnaby man in cardiac arrest on a path near the Lougheed SkyTrain Station, not far from the boundary between northeastern Burnaby andCoquitlam. The Integrated Homicide Investigation Team is investigating.

Name: Tarsem Dhaliwal - Jan. 21, 2014
Description: The 35-year-old man was found dead in a vehicle at the end of a dead-end road near 189th Street and 92nd Avenue after going out to meet a friend. Randeep Singh Match, 33, was later arrested. On January 26, 2018, Match pleaded guilty to manslaughter.

Name: Johannes Foo - Jan. 13, 2014
Description: The 23-year-old Richmond man was found seriously injured on a driveway in the 8400-block of Steveston Highway. Police said the homicide was not a random act.

Name: Julie Paskall - Dec. 29, 2013
Description: The 53-year-old was fatally attacked Dec. 29 as she waited for her son outside Newton Arena in Surrey. Police believe the hockey mom was the victim of a botched robbery, but have yet to catch her killer.

Name: Karim Meskine - Dec. 17, 2013
Description: The 18-year-old was brutally beaten Dec. 17 in an unprovoked attack as he walked through a southwest New Westminster neighbourhood. A 16-year-old boy was convicted of second-degree murder in 2016. Police suspect the attack was an attempted robbery.

Name: Phillip Oun - Dec. 17, 2013
Description: The body of the 23-year-old was discovered near 124 Street and 102 Avenue in Surrey. Police said he was involved in criminal activity and the homicide is believed to be a targeted attack.

Name: Xin Shi “Steven” Dong - Dec. 12, 2013
Description: The 20-year-old Burnaby resident's body was discovered between homes in a residential neighbourhood near the Fraserview Golf Course. The victim is known to police and was associated to gangs and connected to the drug trade.

Name: Christina Docherty - Dec. 2, 2013
Description: The body of the 61-year-old Burnaby woman linked to the drug trade was discovered in her Burnaby apartment in the 4900-block of Hastings Street. Following an investigation, Maple Ridge resident Trudy Gail Hunter, 60, was charged in April 2014 with second-degree murder.

Name: Rostam Poulad-Noshiravan - Nov. 30, 2013
Description: The 69-year-old promoter of Persian and Zoroastrian concerts was shot to death in the 4000 block of St. Georges Avenue. Witnesses reported seeing a grey or silver import car speed away from the shooting.

Name: Ronald Richard Lomas - Nov. 23, 2013
Description: The 44-year-old, who was known to police and had an extensive criminal record dating back to 1986, died after reports of a fight at an unlicensed after-hours bar inside a Surrey home.

Name: Mark Winston Berry - Nov. 18, 2013
Description: The 44-year-old man's body was found on the property of a house in the 12000 block of 99 Avenue. He was known to police.

Name: Corey Bennett. - Nov. 9, 2013
Description: The 44-year-old man died in what police are calling a "targeted home invasion" in the 2600 block of King George Blvd. in South Surrey. Police have made two arrests.

Name: Lisa Ann Zielke - Oct. 31, 2013
Description: The 41-year-old was known to police. Her body was spotted in the parking lot of Surrey's Hi-Knoll Park, near the boundary with Langley.

Name: Satwant Singh Bains - Oct. 25, 2013
Description: The Surrey resident said goodbye to his wife and kids before getting into his car and being fatally shot in his driveway. He was not known to police.

Name: La Van Truong (Rudy) Phan - Oct. 10, 2013
Description: The 32-year-old was gunned down in the backyard of his home on the 7200 block of Victoria Drive.

Name: Unidentified person - Sept. 20, 2013
Description: The person's body was found in a house in the 8100 block of 145th Street in Surrey. Cause of death: shot. Hong Manh Nguyen, 56, was arrested at the airport several hours later.

Name: Ezar Ahmed Khan - Sept. 18 2013
Description: The 30-year-old Surrey man — who sources say was a “low-level trafficker” — was found dead in Joe Brown Park. Police said the murder appears to be targeted, though not gang-related.

Name: Unidentified man - Aug. 28, 2013
Description: The man in his 30s died in hospital after an apparent gunshot wound in what police believe was a targeted, gang related hit. midnight. The man was found in a car in the area of Brunette Avenue and Laurentian.

Name: Jill Lyons and Karen Nabors - August 12 and 25, 2013
Description: Lyons, 45, was found Aug. 12 and Nabors, 48, on Aug. 25 in the same apartment complex in New Westminster, prompting the RCMP to issue a public warning sex-trade workers. In January, 2014, Sarbjit Bains, a 32-year-old man, was charged with their murders, as well as the murder of Amritpal Saran, whose charred remains were found on Colebrook Road in Surrey in February, 2013.

Name: Robert Paterson - Aug. 17, 2013
Description: The 40-year-old was run over in the parking lot near the Royal Canadian Legion at 106th Ave. and 135A St. Christopher Lennox Edgar Griffith, 31, has been charged with criminal negligence causing death

Name: Unidentified man - Aug. 16, 2013
Description: The 17-year-old man died following an early morning attack at the Japan House Restaurant on Kingsway Avenue near Slocan Street.The man, who investigators say was known to police, had been taken to hospital at around 1 a.m., but later died from his injuries.

Name: Kyle Yellowbird - Aug. 16, 2013
Description: Yellowbird, 21, was stabbed in a fight near 154th Street and 100th Avenue in Surrey. Police have a suspect — described as a man in his 40s to 50s — but have yet to lay any charges.

Name: Agnes Assen  - July 9, 2013
Description: In what Coquitlam RCMP are calling a murder-suicide, Benyoucef Assen murdered his wife Agnes and then set the house on fire.

Name: Scott Ashley McMillan - July 7, 2013
Description: The 55-year-old Surrey man survived three days on life support before dying from a vicious beating in his home. No arrests have been made.

Name: Harpreet Singh Chahal - June 23, 2013
Description: Harpreet Singh Chahal, 25, was critically wounded in a targeted shooting on South Fraser Way at Emerson. The Abbotsford man was an associate of one of the accused killers of Red Scorpion gangster Jonathan Bacon.

Name: Gurpreet Kaur - June 19, 2013
Description: The 30-year-old was found dead in her home in the 6700 block of 145A St. Her husband, Dilber Singh Atwal, 49, was also found at the scene.

Name: Edward Stobie Billy - June 15, 2013
Description: The body of the 20-year-old man was found inside thebasement of a house in the 900 block of East 63rd after a fire. Police later determined the fire was deliberately set, making Billy the city's thirdhomicide victim of 2013.

Name: Clifford Arthur Devitt - May 12, 2013
Description: The 44-year-old transient Maple Ridge man who routinely travelled around the area by bicycle was found dead near a trail in Coquitlam's Colony Farm regional park.

Name: Claude DeGuire - April 30, 2013
Description: The 26-year old Maple Ridge drug trafficker was gunned down in front of shocked shoppers outside the Haney Place Mall about 8 p.m. Edward Marke Antonsen, 29, of Maple Ridge pleaded guilty to manslaughter. Police say the slaying was related to the local drug trade.

Name: Craig Widdifield - April 24, 2013
Description: The 28-year-oldl man was gunned down in a brazen public shooting in south Surrey outside a Steve Nash fitness club. Police said the shooting is a continuation of disturbing drug gang violence. Brody Robert Paterson, 20, was arrested in Surrey in 2014 and charged with first-degree murder.

Name: Jackie Olson - March 19, 2013
Description: The 43-year-old woman was found dead in the Whalley area of Surrey after an apparent domestic dispute. A family member of the victim was arrested.

Name: William David Floyd - March 1, 2013
Description: The 47-year-old man was found dead after being involved in an altercation in the 1000 block Main Street after being ejected from the Ivanhoe Pub

Name: Taylor Daniel Johnson - Feb. 26, 2013
Description: Police who attended a rural south Langley home discovered both the dead 21-year-old man and a marijuana growing operation inside.

Name: Amritpal Saran - Feb. 24, 2013
Description: The charred body of the 29-year-old Delta resident was found by a motorist at the side of Colebrook Road. Saran was "known to police," but to their knowledge wasn't associated to any gang. In January, 2014, Sarbjit Bains, 32, was charged in Saran's death, as well as the deaths of Jill Lyons and Karen Nabors, both found dead in a New Westminster apartment in August, 2013.

Name: Unidentified girl - Feb. 15, 2013
Description: A 16-year-old girl was killed and a 15-year-old girl injured in a stabbing on the Tsawwassen First Nation reserve in Delta. A 17-year-old youth has been charged with second-degree murder and attempted murder.

Name: Janice Shore - Feb. 15, 2013
Description: The 45-year-old was found badly beaten in a vacant lot near 104 Ave. and 135A St. in Surrey. She battled mental illness and police say she was involved in "highrisk" activities

Name: Leanne Friesen - Feb. 6, 2013
Description: The 40-year-old mother of two was discovered in the garage of her home with fatal gunshot wounds. Her estranged husband Jeffrey Friesen was arrested on scene and charged with the murder.

Name: Michael Charles Gregory - Feb. 9, 2013
Description: The 59-year-old Vancouver man died after suffering serious injuries in an assault at Commercial Drive and Venables Street. A 27-year-old man was in custody.

Name: Jaskaran Singh Sandhu - Jan. 28, 2013
Description: The body of the 26-year-old Coquitlam resident who had gang affiliations was found near Colebrook Road in Surrey. He was lucky 16 months ago when he survived a targeted hit outside a Mr. Lube automotive centre in Coquitlam.

Name: Manraj Akalirai - Jan. 23, 2013
Description: The 19-year-old Vancouver man was reportedly attacked near Elgin Street near East 47th Avenue by up to 10 suspects wielding various weapons including bats and a sword. Amritpal Dhillon, 20, has been charged with second-degree murder and 18-year-old Amritpaul Rakhra is facing one count of manslaughter. Both were arrested by Vancouver police officers in April 2013.

Name: Manjinder Singh Hairan - Jan. 15, 2013
Description: The gangster linked to the late Sukh Dhak was targeted in an early morning Surrey shooting near 127 Street and 112B Avenue. Another gangster also linked to Dhak was seriously wounded in the shooting. The dead man was on bail on drug charges.

Name: Manjot Singh Dhillon - Jan. 13, 2013
Description: The former 27-year-old associate of the late gangster Sukh Dhak was shot to death near 168 Street and 76 Avenue.

Name: John Edward McGiveron and Geordie Wesley Carlow - Jan. 13, 2013
Description: The two 33-year-old Surrey men were shot to death in a parkade of an apartment complex at 9450 128th Street. Police said while the victims were known to police for property crimes, they are not believed to have gang links.

Name: Cole Adam Manning - Dec. 31, 2012
Description: Langley RCMP were called New Year's Eve to a house in the 19800-block of 69th Ave., where they found Manning, 40, dead inside a basement suite he had recently rented. Jason Terrence Brewer, 24, has been charged with second degree murder. Police say the two were friends.

Name: Sam Balani - Dec. 27, 2012
Description: Police say the shooting death of the 32-year-old man in New Westminster was a targeted hit. Balani was renting the basement suite where his body was found when police responded to a call of shots being fired

Name: Sukh Dhak and Thomas Mantel - Nov. 26, 2012
Description: Gangster Sukh Dhak, 28, and his bodyguard Thomas Mantel, 30, were shot to death in a brazen targeted execution at the Executive Hotel in Burnaby. Both men were well-known to police and those involved in the B.C. gang scene.

Name: Jeremy McLellan - Nov. 25, 2012
Description: The 35-year-old man died after a stabbing at a Surrey apartment on 128th Street and 95 Avenue. William Engebretsen, 54, who resides at the apartment where the stabbing happened, was charged with second-degree murder.

Name: Matthew Johnathon Hall - Nov. 17, 2012
Description: Hall's body was found in a badly burned car following a suspicious fire. Pollice later determined his death to be Vancouver’s 9th homicide of 2012. Investigators believe the car fire was deliberately set.

Name: Panagotia Zerbinos - Nov. 8, 2012
Description: The 48-year-old woman was found dead in a Surrey basement. Her daughter, Gloria Zerbinos, 28, of Surrey, was charged with second-degree murder.

Name: Alexander Julian Liang - Oct. 31, 2012
Description: The 21-year-old Vancouver man out on bail on charges of drug trafficking and unlawful confinement was shot to death at his parents’ eastside home on Halloween night.

Name: January Marie Lapuz - Sept. 29, 2012
Description: Lapuz, who was born with the name John Carlo Embo Lapuz, was killed in a Saturday night stabbing in the 500-block of Third Avenue in New Westminster. Police are looking for a suspect.

Name: Joseph Allan Markel - Sept. 8, 2012
Description: The 32-year-old man was shot at his parents’ home. He was known to police and the shooting is considered a targeted attack. Markel, also known as Joey Markel, was an associate of the Dhak-Duhre gang.

Name: Jag Johal - Sept. 6, 2012
Description: The 37-year-old Delta resident was shot multiple times in broad daylight while sitting in the passenger side of a car in a parking lot at 68 Avenue and King George Boulevard. Police say it was a targeted attack. Johal is the brother to Shminder Johal, who was sentenced to 18 years in prison in July for smuggling cocaine and guns into B.C.

Name: Christopher James Pammenter - August 23, 2012
Description: Pammenter, 46, was shot near midnight while sitting in a car in the driveway of his Surrey home in the Fraser Heights area. Police say he was known to them and they believe the shooting is entirely related to gang activities.

Name: Sara Norouzy  - Aug. 18, 2012
Description: The badly-decomposed body of the 31-year-old woman from Iran was found by someone walking by. Police said she died as a result of foul play.

Name: Unnamed man - August 14, 2012
Description: The 38-year-old man, whose name was not released by police, was found dead from stab wounds in a home. The man's wife, Pui Chun "Winnie" Poon, 35, was charged with second degree murder.

Name: Ronald William March - Aug. 8, 2012
Description: The 57-year-old Burnaby man was fatally stabbed on Aug. 8 in East Vancouver. His body was discovered in the rear lane of the 3400 block Renfrew Street. Lance Wraye Standberg, 47, of Burnaby, has been charged second-degree murder.

Name: Randy Naicker - June 25, 2012
Description: Longtime gangster and founder of the Independent Soldiers Randy Naicker was shot to death in Port Moody. Naicker, a convicted kidnapper once targeted by killers at his Vancouver halfway house, was gunned down at about 4:45 p.m. near St. Johns and Queens streets. There were no arrests.

Name: Gordon Spencer and Bruce Mayo - June 23, 2012
Description: Gordon Spencer, 27, who died at the scene, and  Bruce Mayo, 25, who died in hospital, were both shot in a suspected domestic incident at a rural Langley home.

Name: Gurbinder Singh (Bin) Toor - May 30, 2012
Description: Gangster Gurbinder Singh (Bin) Toor, 35, was shot to death outside the Port Moody Recreation Centre as he arrived for a ball hockey game. There were no arrests.

Name: Huong (Andy) Tran and Chinh Diem Huynh -- May 27, 2012
Description: Andy Tran, the owner of a tiny Burnaby sushi restaurant, was gunned down along with  female employee Chinh Diem Huynh inside the business at the time. They were found by police shortly after 9:30 p.m. inside Tran's Royal Oak Sushi House restaurant. Former security guard Angus Mitchell, who was later killed by police and was carrying a hit list, is believed to have been responsible.

Name: Selvin Krishna - May 13, 2012
Description: The 36-year-old Maple Ridge man was fatally stabbed as the result of an altercation that occurred near 223nd Street and McIntosh Avenue in Maple Ridge.

Name: Ethel Fenotti - May 10, 2012
Description: The 72-year-old woman was found dead in an apartment suite on East 12th Avenue near Main Street. Her son, Richard Glenn Shields, 50, is charged with second degree murder.

Name: Nirmal Bains - May 5, 2012
Description: The 80-year-old man was found on his rural Abbotsford property. The senior was out for his morning walk when he didn't return as planned.  He was found in an outbuilding on their property in the 31700 block of Huntingdon Road east of Townline Road.

Name: Noel Jackson - May 3, 2012
Description: The 21-year-old man originally from Ontario was shot to death in a Surrey basement suite near 124th Street and 70th Avenue. Michael Ross, 24, and Jonathan Kishimoto, 21, were arrested in November 2012 and charged with second-degree murder. Police said the homicide followed an argument.

Name: Ranjit Singh Cheema - May 2, 2012
Description: The high-profile Vancouver gangster was the victim of a drive-by shooting. He was gunned down about 9 a.m. in the 1100-block of East 61st Avenue, in front of his parents' house.

Name: Tashina Rae Sutherland - March 29, 2012
Description: The 23-year-old Burnaby woman was found in the 10600-block of 138th Street needing medical attention. A 23-year-old Surrey woman, Jessica Hanley, faces second-degree murder charges.

Name: Justine Nethaniel Po - April 18, 2012
Description: The 36-year-old was fatally shot in the 6000-block of Katsura Street, near Westminster Highway and Garden City Road in Richmond, at 1:10 p.m. Po was once charged in connection with the murder of Lotus Gang boss Raymond Chan.

Name: David Bourgeois - March 30, 2012
Description: The 41-year-old was found dead in a Maple Ridge home on River Road. He is known to police for his involvement in the drug trade.

Name: Chelsea Rose Holden - March 19, 2012
Description: The 28-year-old mother of two was killed early in the morning at the Cobalt Motor Hotel (917 Main St.). She was found suffering from stab wounds and died about 45 minutes later in hospital. Xavier Sacha Gellatly, 21, a native of Quebec, is charged with second degree murder.

Name: Unidentified man - March 17, 2012
Description: The man died from stabbing after a possible home invasion in Surrey Saturday night. Police say they found one man in a basement suite in the 11000 block of 168th Street suffering from head wounds and what appeared to be the effects of pepper spray. Officers followed a blood trail to a second man nearby who was unresponsive. He was pronounced dead at the scene.

Name: Cory Kelly - March 9, 2012
Description: A 25 year-old man is dead following a shooting in Aldergrove. Police said the shooting is a result of an attempted break and enter to a home containing a marijuana growing operation

Name: Unidentified man - Feb. 26, 2012
Description: The 31-year-old man was shot dead in what Surrey Mounties called a targeted (but non-gang-related) killing at a north Whalley duplex. No arrests have been made.

Name: Jimmy Chau - Feb. 19, 2012
Description: The 31-year-old Edmonton gangster was found dead in a muddy Abbotsford field near the U.S. border. He is the city's second homicide of the year. Police say the murder is likely gang related.

Name: Jenny Le Wong - Feb. 14, 2012
Description: The 30-year-old Vancouver woman was fatally shot about 6 p.m. in a basement suite in the 3400-block East Georgia Street. Her 31-year-old ex-husband is facing a murder charge.

Name: Brandon James Howson - Jan. 31, 2012
Description: The body of the 26-year-old Maple Ridge man was found in an agricultural area at the north end of 224 Street, near 144 Avenue, in Pitt Meadows. Adam Deboo, another local man, has been charged with second-degree murder.

Name: John Alexander - Jan. 26, 2012
Description: A 61-year-old Richmond woman was charged with second-degree murder after her husband was found dead from severe head trauma. Jo Anne Alexander was under psychiatric care after being arrested Jan. 30 at the home she shared with husband John in the 11900-block of Aztec St.

Name: Sean Beaver - Jan. 19, 2012
Description: The Montreal man was killed and another critically injured after what police say was a targeted shooting in Surrey. The men, aged 27 and 28, were found at the scene suffering from gunshot wounds. One died later in hospital.

Name: Sandip (Dip) Duhre - Jan. 17, 2012
Description: The long-time gangster, age 36, was gunned down execution-style by someone he was meeting at the Wall Centre in Vancouver.

Name: Ryan Saint-Ange - Jan. 14, 2012
Description: The 21-year-old man's body was discovered by a friend at his rental home in Abbotsford. Shayne Steven Vauthrin, who has no previous criminal record, was charged with Saint-Ange's murder.

Name: Patrick Martin - Jan. 11, 2012
Description: Martin, 41, of Surrey, died after being found unconscious in an alley of the 12800 block of 92A Avenue, marking Surrey’s first homicide of 2012.

Name: Apollo-Lyn Simpson - Dec. 27, 2011
Description: Simpson, 28, was found dead in the 9500-block of 125th Street in Surrey around 8:30 a.m. on Tuesday. B.C. Ambulance Service pronounced him dead at the scene, saying it appears he was murdered.

Name: Jeremy Olivier Bettan - Dec. 26, 2011
Description: Bettan, 38, of Langley, was found shot to death next to a Mercedes SUV in the driveway of his upscale Walnut Grove rental home in the 9100-block of 207th Street.

Name: Alok Gupta - Dec. 25, 2011
Description: Gupta, 27, was shot dead in an apparent robbery as he filled in for the owners at Ken’s Grocery in Surrey. In July 2012, William Andrew Whiteside, 22, of Surrey, was charged with the fatal shooting of Gupta.

Name: Bradley McPherson - Dec. 24, 2011
Description: McPherson, 28, was shot dead during a rowdy house party in Surrey.

Name: Thuy Yen "Jenny" Vu - Dec. 14, 2011
Description: The 38-year-old woman driving a newer model BMW died in a spray of gunfire as her toddler son looked on from the back seat. The toddler was unharmed. The shooting appeared to be targeted, police said.

Name: Branson Kerick Rendell Sanders - Dec. 2, 2011
Description: The 20-year-old Burnaby resident was found dead in a wooded area near Burnaby Lake. Investigators believe Sanders was killed while at a Surrey party in the 18000-block of 55th Avenue and his body later dumped where it was found. Burnaby resident Shakib Abdiriz Shakib, 19, and Surrey's Brandon Nandon, also 19, face second-degree murder charges.

Name: Axel Curtis - Nov. 6, 2011
Description: The 29-year-old man linked to the United Nations gang was gunned down in a brazen morning shooting in a busy Vancouver residential neighbourhood. He was shot dead at about 9:30 a.m. while walking his French bulldog near his eight-storey apartment building.

Name: Stephen Leone - Oct. 22, 2011
Description: Leone, a man linked to the Dhak gang, was killed and two others wounded - including a 15-year-old boy - in this targeted shooting in Surrey. A masked gunman was seen running up to a black Acura sedan in a strip mall and firing several rounds inside.

Name: Donald Ramsay - Nov. 5, 2011
Description: A North Vancouver man was charged with murder after allegedly killing his father Donald, 53, and seriously wounding his mother at their shared home. Charged with murder was Jordan Ramsay, 27.

Name: Jessie David Daniel Thomson - Oct. 16, 2011
Description: The 22-year-old man was allegedly assaulted Oct. 16 and died of his injuries two weeks later. Thomson had stumbled out into the road in the 600-block of Terminal Avenue after he was allegedly assaulted, and was struck by a vehicle. A Burnaby man was expected to be charged with manslaughter.

Name: Jamie Kehoe - Oct. 7, 2011
Description: The heroic teen, 18, died after being stabbed in the neck while trying to stop a fight between two women on a bus. The suspect, another man on the bus, and one of the fighting women fled the bus.

Name: Maple Batalia - Sept. 28, 2011
Description: Batalia, 19, was gunned down on Sept. 28 at about 1 a.m. in a parking lot beside Simon Fraser University's Surrey campus. The health sciences student, actress and model had spent the evening inside, studying. No charges have been laid but police have seized a vehicle that may be linked to the murder.

Name: Joshua Jonathan Tanasiuk - Sept. 17, 2011
Description: Tanasiuk, 24, of Burnaby, was stabbed while in a car on the 1300-block of Victoria Drive in the city's 11th homicide of 2011. Shane Frederick James Yukich, 22, was charged with murder.

Name: Bayush Hagos - Sept. 1, 2011
Description: Bayush Hagos, 57, was found dead in her apartment around 6:30 a.m. Sept. 1.  Ayelech Zenebe Ejigu, 41, has been charged with second-degree murder.

Name: Lancy Hu - Aug. 27, 2011
Description: The body of the 27-year-old Burnaby woman was found Aug. 27 in a suitcase in the Fraser River. Her husband, Zhongming (James) Mou, 35, has pleaded guilty to second-degree murder.

Name: Josie Tomajin - Aug. 8, 2011
Description: The 45-year-old woman was found dead outside her Burnaby home. Her son, Benedict Bernabe Tomajin, 24, was charged with second-degree murder.

Name: Unidentified man - Aug. 7, 2011
Description: A 53-year-old man was found stabbed to death outside his basement suite in Surrey.

Name: Ravinder Bhangu - July 28, 2011
Description: Bhangu, a 24-year-old Surrey resident, was an administrative assistant at the weekly English/Punjabi Sach Di Awaaz, where she was attacked. Her husband, Ravinder Bhangu, was arrested.

Name: Melanie Alexis O’Neill - July 26, 2011
Description: The Simon Fraser University professor was found dead in her Vancouver home.  Matthew James Scott, 25, was arrested on March 3, 2012 and charged with second-degree murder. Police said he had an on-again, off-again relationship with O'Neill.

Name: Matthew John Blosser - July 15, 2011
Description: The 33-year-old Vancouver man was found deceased in an apartment in the 600 block Vernon Drive in East Vancouver. A charge of second degree murder was laid against Dustin Duke Brertton, 35, of Vancouver in relation to the homicide, the city’s seventh of the year.

Name: Christopher James Krake - July 6, 2011
Description: The 24-year-old man with gang ties was the victim of a targeted hit in Coquitlam. His bodywas found on a wooded nature path off Spuraway Avenue, near Ranch Park Way, in a quiet residential neighbourhood. It appears he was killed at that location.

Name: Quannah Jo O'Soup - July 3, 2011
Description: The 38-year-old man was pronounced dead by ambulance attendants when they arrived at his North Delta home. Beatrice Thomas, 37, is common-law spouse, has been charged with second degree murder in the stabbing death.

Name: Christopher Reddy - June 24, 2011
Description: The 24-year-old Vancouver gangster who was up on gun charges was the victim of a fatal shooting in Surrey. He was shot to death in a targeted hit.

Name: Jessica Eguia-Cornejo - June 20, 2011
Description: The woman, 36, was found murdered in a third-storey apartment in the 7400-block of Fraser Street.  Richmond resident Anthony Blake Cruz, 28, was charged with second-degree murder in relation to the city’s sixth homicide of the year.

Name: Balwinder Uppal  - June 4, 2010
Description: The  body of the 43-year-old man was found Saturday in a Surrey residence. The cause of death has been confirmed as multiple gunshot wounds. Investigators believe that this is a targeted homicide and is not arandom act of violence.

Name: Gerald David Haakmat -- June 1, 2011
Description: The 50-year-old Vancouver man succumbed to his injuries the day after being stabbed in Oppenheimer Park.

Name: Manbir Kajla -- April 27, 2011
Description: The 30-year-old Surrey man was shot to death after a minor car accident in Surrey. Police are looking for the driver of an SUV, thought to be a South Asian male.

Name: Devon Allaire-Bell - April 24, 2011
Description: The 19-year-old man died from his injuries after two men were stabbed behind Frank Hurt Secondary school after an altercation with a group of six men.  The suspects were all described as Indo-Canadian males, dressed in dark clothing, and thought to be about 20 years of age, police said.

Name: Neil Barnett - March 30, 2011
Description: The 47-year-old was fatally stabbed near Carrall Street and West Pender. Friends believe he was in the wrong place at the wrong time. A 24-year-old man has been charged with manslaughter.

Name: Zsolt Csikos - March 26, 2011
Description: The 43-year-old Burnaby man was stabbed to death near Metrotown in Burnaby. Yacine Zouaoui, 19, of Burnaby was arrested one hour after the stabbing. In 2012, Zouaoui was found guilty of second-degree murder in the stabbing.

Name: Raymond Robertson - March 9, 2011
Description: Vancouver recorded its second homicide of the year after a 56 year old man was found deceased in a 7th floor suite at 16 East Hastings Street. 42-year-old Vancouver resident Alice Susan Bullington was arrested April 6 and charged with manslaughter.

Name: George Antone - March 7, 2011
Description: Antone, 71, an elder of the Kwantlen First Nation, was found dead by a family member and was the victim of an apparent homicide.  Michele Serdar pleaded guilty to manslaughter in 2015. She was not arrested until Nov. 24, 2013, more than two years after the killing.

Name: Milad Nournia - Feb. 17, 2011
Description: Nournia, 26, had a loaded handgun on him when he was shot  in the 1000-block of Hornby Street, near Helmcken.  The suspect fled. It was Vancouver's first homicide of 2011.

Name: Carla Marie Smith - Feb. 7, 2011
Description: The 27-year-old woman's body was found on the north side of Burnaby Lake Regional Park on Monday. Smith was known to Vancouver police as being involved in the sex trade.

Name: Jennifer Ferguson - Feb. 2, 2011
Description: The body of the 40-year-old Surrey woman was discovered by a passerby in a small wooded area in the 2300-block of Kirkstone Road. Her common-law spouse, Harvey Bracken, pleaded guilty to manslaughter for her death, and was sentenced in 2012 to four years in jail, minus time served.

Name: Unidentified person - Jan. 8, 2011
Description: Two people found dead in a Richmond hotel were victims of a murder-suicide. One individual was the victim of a homicide while the other was a victim of self-inflicted injuries. The cause of death was sharp edge trauma. No names were released.

Name: David MaCaulay - Dec. 18, 2010
Description: The 23-year-old Quebec died following an altercation at the Royal  Towers apartment building.  Douglas Edward Sumner, 32 of New Westminster, faces a charge of second-degree murder.

Name: Paul Phelan - Nov. 25, 2010
Description: The 43-year-old was found on the street in the 10700-block of 135A Street about 11:05 p.m. Police said he was not known to police and not involved in the drug trade. He may have been coming from or going to a nearby liquor store.

Name: Karver Jesse Morford - Nov. 8, 2010
Description: The  35-year-old Chilliwack  man was found dead in his home. Police say Morford was last seen alive on Saturday, Nov. 6. He was discovered by a family member on Nov. 8,  at around 2 p.m. deceased in his home in the rural Ryder Lake area of Chilliwack.

Name: Gurmit Singh Dhak - Oct. 16, 2010
Description: The long-time gangster and convicted killer was gunned down inside his luxury SUV outside Burnaby's Metrotown mall. His wife and children were watching.

Name: Theodore Williamson - October 7, 2010
Description:
VANCOUVER — Vancouver police are investigating a homicide after a man was found dead inside an East Vancouver home Thursday morning.
On Friday, VPD identified the dead man as Theodore Williamson, a 54-year-old Vancouver resident. This is Vancouver's 9th homicide of 2010.
Around 9:45 a.m. Thursday, October 7, police received a 911 call about a possible homicide in the 3900-block of Gladstone Street across from Gladstone secondary school.

Read more: http://www.vancouversun.com/news/Update+identify+found+dead+inside+East+Vancouver+home/3638695/story.html

Name: Randall William Davis - October 7, 2010
Description:
A 51-year-old Surrey man gunned down Thursday morning was scheduled to be in provincial court on drug charges just hours after his murder.

Randall William Davis was shot to death in the driveway of his rural rental home at 17692 24 Ave. about 7 a.m. Thursday. Court records indicate his appearance in Surrey Provincial Court was slated for 1:30 p.m.

Read more: http://www.vancouversun.com/news/gunned+down+driveway+rural+South+Surrey+home+identified/3638254/story.html

Name: Laura Szendrei - Sept. 25, 2010
Description:
Burnsview Secondary School student Laura Szendrei, 15, was attacked in a wooded area of the park, in the 8200-block of 110th Street near Sands secondary school, around 1:30 p.m. on Saturday.

She died early Sunday morning with her family at her side, Delta police Sgt. Sharlene Brooks said at a news conference Sunday afternoon.

Read more: http://www.vancouversun.com/news/Delta+teen+died+after+assault+park+maced+last+week+friends/3580818/story.html

Name: Lin Wah Sam - Sept. 23, 2010
Description:
Lin Wah Sam, a 59-year-old Vancouver resident, was shot while inside the Happy Blossom Restaurant at 2052 Kingsway on September 23rd. The only suspect description is of an unknown person wearing black clothing.

Read more: http://www.vancouversun.com/news/shot+dead+Vancouver+restaurant+struggled+with+massive+debts+prior+death/3576276/story.html

Name: Kenneth Corey Heathorn - Sept. 20, 2010
Description: The 36-year-old Maple Ridge man was shot Monday while riding his bike in Maple Ridge. He died from his injuries on Wednesday. Police said he was involved in the street-level drug trade.

Name: Thavone Narong - Sept. 16, 2010
Description: The 49-year-old father of Surrey Six victim Eddie Narong was found dead about 6 a.m. in a late model champagne-coloured Toyota sedan in the 3000-block of Charles Court. Police say it's likely a targeted attack.

Name: Jose Hector Luna Morales - Aug. 30, 2010
Description: The 28-year-old man was found dead in a house in the 13800-block 112th Avenue in North Surrey after reports of a disturbance. Lester Ovidio Beuzo Oseguera, 29, was charged with murder, unlawfully discharging a firearm and three counts of discharging a firearm with intent to wound or disfigure.

Name: Naib Toor - Aug. 23, 2010
Description: The 33-year-old was stabbed to death, while a 42-year-old woman survived what police are calling serious knife wounds. Iqbal Vinepal, 54, of Surrey was arrested when police found him in a house in the  12800-block of 99th Avenue in Surrey with the victims.

Name: Juel Ross Stanton - Aug. 12, 2010
Description: The long-time member of the East End Hells Angels was gunned down about 6:15 a.m. outside his huge heritage home near Vancouver City Hall. Stanton, 41, was out on bail on weapons and assault charges at the time of his early morning execution

Name: Mandy Astin Johnson - July 28, 2010
Description: The 22-year-old Langley resident, who was known to police,  was found dead at 3 a.m. at Townline Road and Polar Avenue after a shooting. At the crime scene police also found a physically unharmed but "traumatized" man.

Name: Amarjit Kaur Khosa - July 21, 2010
Description: Police were called about 7 p.m. to a home where they found the deceased 34-year-old woman. Police said the death is not believed to be gang or drug related.

Name: Adem Aliu - July 14, 2010
Description: The 17-year-old Surrey resdient was shot several times about 3 a.m. near 103A Avenue and 142 Street in Surrey. Surrey gang member Steven Brandon Mulligan-Brum, 20 at the time, pleaded guilty to manslaughter and was sentenced to seven years. Police said Aliu was among a group of youths who had been drinking and vandalizing nearby parked cars when police allege that the suspect, a driver of one of the vandalized cars, caught up with the group two blocks from where his vehicle was parked. Police say the suspect singled out Aliu and shot him.

Name: Harchie Tupas Onas - July 12, 2010
Description:
The 31-year-old man died after being shot multiple times in what the Integrated Homicide Investigation Team says was likely a targeted attack. The victim was found about 1:30 a.m. outside his father's home in the 4200 block Boundary Road in Burnaby. No arrests have been made. Click here to read more.
(http://www.vancouversun.com/news/dead+after+overnight+shooting+Burnaby/3266201/story.html)

Name: Trevor Ronald Sanderson - June 27, 2010
Description: The Mission man wasdiscovered at his house in the30700-block of Keystone Avenue in Mission. No arrests have been made in what police suspect was a targeted homicide.

Name: Teri-Lyn Williams - June 9, 2010
Description: The 41-year-old sex-trade worker's body was found in a small bush by a passersby at around 6 a.m. on 104A Avenue between King George Boulevard and Whalley Boulevard. Read the full story here. (http://www.vancouversun.com/Homicide+police+identify+woman+found+Surrey/3162545/story.html)

Name: Marianthi Teresa Tsanas - June 3, 2010
Description: The 25-year-old Surrey woman is believed to have been shot by her 34-year-old boyfriend, who later took his own life, in the Cloverdale neighbourhood. Police found Tsanas lying in the middle of the roadway on 67th Avenue suffering from multiple gunshot injuries. She died at the scene. The suspect, who has not been named, shot himself to death as police were looking for him.

Name: Milad Saffari- June 2, 2010
Description: The 27-year-old gangster was killed in a targeted shooting after leaving a Coquitlam gym beside the Superstore on Lougheed Highway.  No arrests have been made. Saffari served two years in jail for his role in a vicious beating death at a Richmond growing operation back in 2002.

Name: Unidentified man - June 1, 2010
Description: A man in his 20s was murdered inside a Vancouver apartment June 1. Vancouver police got a 911 call about 10:30 a.m. saying a man inside an apartment at 1155 Seymour might be injured. Thomas Forster of Vancouver was arrested at the Vancouver International Airport by members of the Vancouver Police Department and charged with murder.

Name: Donald Robert Reid- May 22, 2010
Description: The 51-year-old man, who was known to police, was found outside his south Surrey home suffering "significant and severe injuries" in what police said was a targeted attack. A small marijuana growing operation was found on the property. No arrests have been made.

Name: Angela Qiu - May 21, 2010
Description: The 17-year-old Surrey resident was a victim of a stabbing after an altercation outside a home in the 6600 block of Knight Street at a party involving 30 to 40 teens. She succumbed to her injuries in hospital Friday morning. An arrest was made several days later.

Name: Chhminder Singh (Shinda) Gill - May 16, 2010
Description:
The 32-year-old businessman was shot to death outside his home at 3779 156th St. around 12:30 a.m. in what police described as a targeted attack. No arrests have been made. Click here to read the full story.
(http://www.vancouversun.com/news/South+Surrey+homicide+victim+criminal+ties+legitimate+businesses/3039669/story.html)

Name: Patricia Rose Pelltier - April 19, 2010
Description: The body of the 88-year-old woman who lived alone in a house in the 3200-block of east 51st Avenue was discovered by police after they received a call from concerned family members. Her 58-year-old adoptive daughter, Junette Page Jobin, of New Westminster, was arrested May 7 for murder.

Name: Patrick Alexander Leblanc - April 9, 2010
Description: Police say the 67-year-old man was likely murdered elsewhere and left in a car in a parking lot at Third Street and Royal Avenue. Charged with second-degree murder are Russell Benson, 38, and Glen Anhert, 28.

Name: Regina Brazil - March 31, 2010
Description: Officers entered the 62-year-old's apartment in the 4600-block of Evergreen Lane in Ladner after a neighbour called police to report the woman had not been seen for a couple of days. Police said the death appeared suspicious and the department's major crime investigators were called in. Click here to read more. (http://www.vancouversun.com/Police+investigating+homicide+Ladner/2753900/story.html)

Name: Terry Blake Scott - March 27, 2010
Description: The 39-year-old Surrey man who was known to police was shot to death inside a busy McDonalds at Scott Road and 110th Avenue at about 6 p.m. with horrified onlookers nearby. Nearly one month later, police arrested 26-year-old Daon Gordon Glasgow of Surrey and charged him with second degree murder.

Name: Huzaifa Kiani - March 17, 2010
Description: The 17-year-old was gunned down in the passenger seat of a friend's car in what police are calling a targeted hit. The shooting took place in a quiet residential part of Surrey about 12:35 p.m. on Boundary Road South near 124th Street. Click here to read more. (http://www.vancouversun.com/news/Surrey+teenager+gunned+down/2701418/story.html)

Name: Unnamed baby boy - March 7, 2010
Description: A 24-year-old Vancouver woman was charged in June , 2010 with two counts of murder in connection to the deaths of her two newborn baby boys. Sarah Jee-Wah Leung, who lives with her family in the 2500-block of Charles Street in East Vancouver, was charged with two counts of second-degree murder. Her first murder count relates to a death on April 2, 2009 and a second count relates to a death on March 7, 2010.

Name: Unidentified man - Jan. 30, 2010
Description:
The 46-year-old Surrey man died after being stabbed in an apartment building in the 13400-block of 71 Avenue in Surrey after a small party. Police had five "persons of interest" in custody. Click here to read the story.
(http://www.vancouversun.com/news/Surrey+dead+after+stabbing+apartment+building/2507821/story.html)

Name: Cliff Soumphonh Thammavongsa - Jan. 27, 2010
Description: The 22-year-old Metro Vancouver man died in hospital after being shot in the torso shortly after 1 p.m. while driving in the 1500 block of E.10th Avenue. He was not known to police, though he appears to have been targeted in the shooting. Vancouver police had no suspects. See the full story here (http://www.vancouversun.com/news/Vancouver+murder+victim+known+police/2495682/story.html)

Name: Tyler Dziwak - Jan. 21, 2010
Description: The 24-year-old Abbotsford man, who was known to police, died after suffering a stab wound to his chest in the 2000-block of Ross Road. Police have made no arrests in the case.

Name: Craig Michael Hall - Jan 16, 2010
Description: The 29-year-old man who was known to police was shot on the steps of a stranger's house in the 4400-block Knight Street in Vancouver. He was known to police. Click here to read the full story. (http://www.vancouversun.com/Vancouver+police+identify+shot+death+Saturday/2455774/story.html)

Name: Sheldon Floyd Herrling - Jan. 14, 2010
Description: The 32-year-old Chilliwack man, who was known RCMP for his involvement in criminal activity, was found dead in an apartment at the 45700 block of Spadina Avenue. Police said it was an isolated incident

Name: Tejinder Kaur Dhanoa - Jan. 5, 2010
Description: The 32-year-old woman's body was found in a home in the 13000 block of English Place in Surrey. Her husband Kamaljit Singh Dhanoa has been charged with second-degree murder. Click here to read more (http://www.vancouversun.com/Surrey+charged+with+murdering+wife/2413336/story.html)

Name: Peter Markus - Jan. 4, 2010
Description: The body of the 39-year-old Coquitlaml man was found inside a residence at the Wildwood Mobile Park on Cayer Street in Coquitlam around 11 a.m. Police later said he was the victim of a domestic homicide and charged 42-year-old Darlene Daigle with one count of second-degree murder.

Name: Susan Miller - Dec. 26, 2009
Description: The  46-year-old woman died after she was stabbed at her Ryder Lake home. Her husband, David Miller, 51, has been charged with second-degree murder. Click here to read more. (http://www.vancouversun.com/news/Chilliwack+charged+with+second+degree+murder+stabbing+death+wife/2389990/story.html)

Name: Alex (Buffalo) Nunez - Nov. 25, 2009
Description: The 27-year-old Richmond man was found shot to death behind a house that contained a marijuana growing operation in the 14400-block of 115 Avenue in Surrey. He was "known to police". Read full story here. (http://www.vancouversun.com/news/Homicide+victim+named+Facebook/2288507/story.html)

Name: Maria Addolorate Catroppa - Nov. 24, 2009
Description: The body of the 69-year-old was found about 3:20 a.m. in a Surrey townhouse. She died of stab wounds. Police arrested her 74-year-old husband, Sebastiano Damin, who was also suffering from stab wounds. He is facing a charge of second-degree murder.

Name: Michelle Vandale - Nov. 11, 2009
Description:
The body of the 41-year-old woman was found in the burned rubble of the family home on Lefeuvre Road in Abbotsford. Her 40-year-old husband has been charged with first-degree murder. Click here to read the full story.
(http://www.vancouversun.com/news/Abbotsford+charged+with+murder+after+wife+found+dead+burned+home/2218294/story.html)

Name: Andrew Lynn Milne - Nov. 3, 2009
Description: The 50-year-old man died as a result of his injuries sustained in a domestic dispute at 20226 Ospring Street in Maple Ridge.  More than two years later, his wife was convicted of his murder. Leah Florence was found guilty of the second murder.

Name: Roxanne Flora Charlie - Oct. 31, 2009
Description:
An early morning double shooting in Surrey left the 26-year-old Kelowna mother dead, a man injured and police left to sort out what went on in the residence near 102A Avenue and 152nd Street. Police have learned that Charlie and some friends had been out clubbing before ended up at the house, where she and a man, whose name has not been released, were shot.Police don't know who the target of the shooting was. Click here to read full story.
(http://www.vancouversun.com/news/Surrey+RCMP+help+solve+mother+murder/2246945/story.html)

Name: Gurpreet Singh "Garry" Bassi - Oct. 26, 2009
Description: The body of the 23-year-old Surrey man was found in a vehicle parked at Surrey Lake Park. Police said the death is suspicious but is not believed to be a random act.  Click here to read the story. (2151070)

Name: Chu Ka “Jonathan” Chang - Oct. 14, 2009
Description: The 27-year-old man was executed about 4:30 p.m. as he sat in an SUV behind a building that houses several businesses in the 7700-block of Edmonds, just off Canada Way.
